product_name: Hammer Nutrition Recoverite Drink Mix - Single Serving
long_description: Make sure today's great workout doesn't become tomorrow's agony-use Hammer Nutrition Recoverite(TM) after your workout! Contains whey protein and maltodextrin, a complex carbohydrate that provides rapid metabolism to help rebuild muscle tissue. Electrolyte enhanced formula helps replenish decreased essential mineral levels in the body. Simply mix 3 - 6 scoops in 12 - 24 oz. of water; take immediately after completing your workout. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Make sure today's great workout doesn't become tomorrow's agony-use Hammer Nutrition Recoverite(TM) after your workout!
